name: Welcome New Customer
content: Hi {{name}}! Welcome to our service. We're excited to have you on board. If you have any questions, feel free to ask!

name: Order Confirmation
content: Thank you for your order #{{orderNumber}}! Your order total is ${{amount}} and it will be processed within 24 hours.

name: Shipping Update
content: Great news {{name}}! Your order #{{orderNumber}} has been shipped and should arrive by {{deliveryDate}}. Tracking: {{trackingNumber}}

name: Support Follow-up
content: Hi {{name}}, I wanted to follow up on our previous conversation. Has your issue been resolved? Please let me know if you need any additional assistance.

name: Promotional Offer
content: Hi {{name}}! We have a special {{discount}}% discount on {{product}} just for you. Use code {{promoCode}} at checkout. Valid until {{expiryDate}}.
